thread.title: Avid Bioservices Selected By Acumen Pharmaceuticals To Lead Process Development And Clinical Manufacture Of Novel Alzheimer's Disease Candidate

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Avid Bioservices Selected By Acumen Pharmaceuticals To Lead Process Development And Clinical Manufacture Of Novel Alzheimer's Disease Candidate
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Avid Bioservices Inc:
* AVID BIOSERVICES SELECTED BY ACUMEN PHARMACEUTICALS TO LEAD PROCESS DEVELOPMENT AND CLINICAL MANUFACTURE OF NOVEL ALZHEIMERâ€™S DISEASE CANDIDATE
